section.name: Lifecycle Contract
section.p: The following contract is fulfilled by the Avalon YAAFI Container

subsection.name: Early Initialization
subsection.p: If a service component is defined as "early-init" the instance of the service component will be incarnated during startup of the container.

subsection.name: Lazy Initialization
subsection.p: If a service component is initialized lazily the implementation class is loaded but incarnation takes place during the first invocation of ServiceManager.lookup().
An invocation of ServiceManager.hasService() will not incarnate a service component instance.

subsection.name: Decommisioning
subsection.p: The decommisioning of a service component instance result in exactly the same state as using a lazily initialized service component. I.e. the implementation class is loaded but no instance exists
